intent_atoms.description: Color values must be derived from ISOInspectorBrandPalette.production to ensure consistency across app and tests.
Replace Asset Catalog color initialization with direct Color(red:green:blue:) using palette values in ISOInspectorAppTheme.swift.
All tests that previously failed due to black accent colors now pass (0 failures).
As a developer, I want the app’s accent and surface background colors to be correctly resolved so that UI elements display the intended brand palette instead of defaulting to black.

functional_units.name: ISOInspectorAppTheme.accentColor
functional_units.description: Provides the accent color for a given ColorScheme by returning a SwiftUI Color constructed from brand palette values.

functional_units.name: ISOInspectorAppTheme.surfaceBackground
functional_units.description: Provides the surface background color for a given ColorScheme using brand palette values to construct a SwiftUI Color.
